data.headline: Junior Backend Engineer
data.summary: Dedicated and resourceful junior backend engineer with a strong foundation in software development. Skilled in designing and implementing robust and scalable backend systems using modern technologies and best practices. Passionate about solving complex problems and continuously learning to improve my skills.

experience.title: Junior Backend Developer
bullets: Developed and maintained RESTful APIs using Spring Boot and Java
Implemented secure and scalable backend services for a e-commerce platform
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve performance issues
Participated in code reviews and mentored junior developers
Contributed to the implementation of CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure as code

experience.title: Intern, Backend Development
bullets: Assisted in the development and maintenance of a microservices-based application
Gained experience in designing and implementing database schemas using PostgreSQL
Participated in Agile ceremonies and contributed to the team's continuous improvement
Collaborated with front-end developers to ensure seamless integration
Demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and a willingness to learn

projects.name: Personal Blog
projects.description: Developed a personal blog using Spring Boot, MySQL, and Thymeleaf. Implemented features such as user authentication, content management, and responsive design.

projects.name: Microservices-based Application
projects.description: Contributed to the development of a microservices-based application during an internship. Gained experience in designing and implementing scalable and resilient backend services.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Smiling, well-lit, focused on the camera.
